channel.title: Translated Air Alert UA

item.title: 🟢 20:08 Dumping anxiety in the Zolotonsky district.Creck on subsequent messages.
item.description: 🟢 20:08 Dumping anxiety in the Zolotonsky district.Creck on subsequent messages. This is a warning from the official Ukrainian Air Monitoring System and may indicate a potential or imminent airstrike or other threat.
